patthana19.6:4.1: Nasavitakkasavicāraṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca savitakkasavicāro dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana19.6:4.2: Nasavitakkasavicāraṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca avitakkavicāramatto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana19.6:4.3: Nasavitakkasavicāraṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca avitakkaavicāro dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … satta.
patthana19.6:5.1: Naavitakkavicāramattaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca avitakkavicāramatto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … satta.
patthana19.6:6.1: Naavitakkaavicāraṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca avitakkaavicāro dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … satta.
patthana19.6:7.1: Hetuyā ekūnapaññāsa, ārammaṇe tiṃsa, adhipatiyā ekūnatiṃsa … pe … purejāte āsevane ekūnatiṃsa … pe … avigate ekūnapaññāsa.
